reviews.text: Is a small city but very interesting. If you want to go shopping is the best option in North of Devon
Nice shopping area ,high st,green lanes shopping centre plenty shops,pannier market ,meet friends ,

On Sunday 15th September my daughter travelled from Leeds to Barnstaple, arriving at Barnstaple around 5pm.

She was the first off the train and rushed to the toilet because the toilet on the other train were not working.  After a six hour journey, she really needed the toilet.  Your staff, were in the process of locking the toilets. 

My daughter asked politely to use the toilet, he said no, they were locked. The train was still emptying.

This man needs sacking, it's a basic human right to be able to use a toilet.

Please tell me you have sacked this person, we have a picture.

I will be taking this to the ombudsman, the press and social media.

With regret

Steve Juett

Excellent, friendly service from Stephen this morning. The minute I got to the station he greeted me, offered help and sorted my ticket in seconds so I didnt have to queue :-))) Lovely start of my journey. Thank you.
Brilliant station! The heritage style reminds me of the good old days!
